Title: The Librarian III: The Curse of the Judas Chalice
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Romance, Thriller
Writer: Marco Schnabel, David N. Titcher (based on characters created by)
Actors: Noah Wyle, Bruce Davison, Stana Katic, Bob Newhart
Plot: Losing his girlfriend because he was at an auction dramatically getting the magical philosopher's stone instead of a date, he needs a vacation - New Orleans but finds himself busy saving Earth from the curse of the Judas chalice/vampires.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
